message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to consider purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm looking to save some money, and I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10500, which is a fair price considering the product's value to you and the minimum I'm willing to accept.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $10500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to consider purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I understand that you're still looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you a price of $10250, which is still a good deal for both of us. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your concession, but $10250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a final offer of $9800. If you're willing to accept this price, I'd be happy to move forward with the purchase. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm trying to be reasonable.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9800. I'm willing to make one last offer, and I'll meet you at $10000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to sell the product to someone else.
